36 5/8 x 15 3/8 in. (93 x 39 cm) (image)
70 1/16 x 16 9/16 in. (178 x 42 cm) (mount) 47 cm W w/roller
inscription:
Poem:

Ominaeshi
ikanaru tane wo
makou to mo
kawari naki ka ni
hana niou ran

Suetaka

No matter what kind of seeds were palnted
golden lace seeds grow into
golden lace flowers.
They don\'t make any difference 
in the scent of the flowers. 

by Kamo Suetaka (1752-1841)
medium: Ink, color, and gofun on silk
title: Standing Prostitute Holding Chinese Lantern Fruit
